channel.title: Need help with admin
channel.description: How do I make an admin lvl 126 and all stats 99 on my own server? btw by chapters then admin and under skills and i fill in 99 and 15m xp it doesn't work when i save it and i log in then it al chance to lvl 1 can any1 tell me what i need to do? And i got another question how do i make my own commands also thanks.

item.title: Need help with admin
item.dc:creator: @Jpspkz Jpspkz
item.description:
@Jpspkz wrote:

Easiest way for commands; download command maker v2, for the admins, either type ::master or if you dont know how to add that go into character files and change their thing (1) to 99 and the exp (0) to 14000000. heres a ::master command: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(99999999, 0); addSkillXP(99999999, 1); addSkillXP(99999999, 2); addSkillXP(99999999, 3); addSkillXP(99999999, 4); addSkillXP(99999999, 5); addSkillXP(99999999, 6); sendMessage("" + playerName + " .. your a nerd."); } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 01:32:52 PM[/size][hr]Did this help any?

Read full topic
